attributes.action: Fit all new build houses with renewable energy devices.
attributes.additional_details: With the environment suffering with emission control, and the all countries focusing on vehicle production becoming  all electric by 2030 it seems vital that every household should be concentrating on producing electricity to help power stations  from burning excessive fossil fuels. This seems like a great opportunity to start building a more environmentally friendly britain and start a trend all coutries should embrace.
attributes.background: To make all new build homes suitable for a more eco freindly future, this would require all new buildings to fit or attach a minimum of 4 solar panels or a renewable energy device with an equivalent power output.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/573013
